fullText: Jay Gatsby lives in West Egg. Daisy Buchanan lives in East Egg. And the new musical about them that opened Thursday at the Broadway Theatre lays a big egg.
dtliExcerpt: Jay Gatsby lives in West Egg. Daisy Buchanan lives in East Egg. And the new musical about them that opened Thursday at the Broadway Theatre lays a big egg.

keyPhrases.quote: the new musical about them that opened Thursday at the Broadway Theatre lays a big egg.

llmScore.reasoning: Claude: The critic uses the theatrical idiom 'lays a big egg' (meaning complete failure) as the punchline to dismiss the entire production with wordplay on the characters' East/West Egg locations. | GPT-4o-mini: The review expresses a clear rejection of the musical, indicating it fails to deliver.
